items.heading: Frontend
items.subheading: Familiar with HTML, CSS, JS; uses React, Tailwind

items.title: Frontend Developer
descriptions: Implemented a comprehensive dashboard with Vue.js for job status visualisation
Created detailed visualisation for job statistics with echarts
Developed an API gateway facilatating communication between the web interface and backend service
Refactoring and optimising existing code to user interface performance

items.heading: Seed Guided Topic Modelling
descriptions: User-topic based word clustering algorithm
Ensemble approach with BERT and statistical models
addresses unseen topics not in the vocabulary

items.heading: Iris: Multithreaded IRC
descriptions: Allowing multiple clients to connect and talk to each other with multi-threading
Developed a plugin protocol to enrich the user experience
Conducted thorough testing with 95% code coverage

items.heading: UltiRTS/Nest-plasmid
descriptions: Built a game lobby server with Nest.js and Typescript, allowing scaling with NestJS workers
Adopted multi-layer data storage with Redis and MySQL strategy for better performance
Capable of token-based session management and Inter-Process communication for improved modularity
Facilitates real-time user-to-user and channel chatting with WebSocket enhancing user experience

items.heading: Medical Chatbot
descriptions: Built an intuitive web interface using React and Redux
Constructed a RESTful server with Flask and MongoDB
Incorporated Google Dialogflow API for accurately analysing users' intentions
Conducted weekly meetings to ensure task tracking on JIRA

items.heading: MaaAssistantArknights/MaaAssistantArknights
descriptions: Engineered a Dart binding for the C++ library, empowering  cross-platform UI with Flutter
Conducted unit testing for the API binding, ensuring its functional correctness
Created issues and pull requests on GitHub to enhance communication with the development team
Documented the API using Dart standard to enhance readability and simplify maintenance
